title: Why is everyone banning The Donger?
body:
Like seriously, I get you dont like playing against Farm Simulator 2163, but seriously, if you're gonna ban {{champion:74}}, go the extra mile and ban {{champion:11}} and {{champion:75}}, because 1/2 the time, all they will ever do is sit there and fucking farm.

\#StopBanningDonger2015
